class.name: UtilityAIBTScoreBasedPicker
class.brief_description: Evaluates its direct child nodes and calculates a score for each of them based on [UtilityAIConsideration] and [UtilityAIConsiderationGroup] nodes that are set as the childs of them.
class.description: The score based picker node evaluates its direct child nodes and calculates a score for each of them based on [UtilityAIConsideration] and [UtilityAIConsiderationGroup] nodes that are set as the childs of them. The direct child node with the highest score is chosen and then ticked.
